A Improved radiation shield technology seems to been developed. Expect the application to the other of this technology.

facebook.title: Spacecraft data nails down radiation risk for humans going to Mars
facebook.summary: A warning for anyone dreaming about a trip to Mars: The journey to the red planet on any existing spacecraft would expose astronauts to radiation doses higher than NASA permits.

facebook.title: Spacecraft data nails down radiation risk for humans going to Mars
facebook.summary:
On its way to the red planet, the Mars Science Laboratory mission confirmed that radiation -- especially cosmic rays, but also solar particles -- would pose substantial radiation risk to any humans who were to embark on the same voyage.
http://www.nature.c

facebook.title: Spacecraft data nails down radiation risk for humans going to Mars
facebook.summary:
Good news: it looks like the level of radiation (cosmic rays and solar charged particles) for people traveling to Mars and back will be manageable ... significant, but something we should be able to shield against well enough to make the journey.
"This is
